name: Tardy Pass
desc: Late to class? Redeem this tardy pass to avoid any disciplinary action!

name: Skip the Lunch Line
desc: Tired of waiting? Redeem this skip the lunch line pass to eat first!

name: Administrator for a Day
desc: Are you jealous of all the cool staff who get to ride in golf carts? Become administrator for a day and you can hitch a ride with them too!

name: Chick-Fil-A Lunch
desc: Enjoy a chicken sandwich, fries and a drink from the tastiest chicken chain in the U.S.!

name: Candy Bag
desc: Snack on chocolate, lollipops, jelly beans, gummy bears and more!

name: School T-Shirt
desc: Rock your school pride with this 100% cotton totally not slave labored shirt!

name: School Spirit Sticker Pack
desc: Showcase your love for you school with this five pack of spirit stickers!
